duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide eyewear solutions and assistance to customers, including measuring, adjusting, and educating on optical products.
Lead and guide the optical team to ensure operational excellence, exceptional service, and adherence to standards.
Analyze and maintain inventory, manage internal systems, and contribute to a positive employee culture within the store.
Set up and close the store, maintaining internal operations and delivering above-and-beyond service to create exceptional customer experiences.
Work with store management to mentor the Optical team, exemplify great service, and maintain general store systems and business operations.

education_certification.credential: Licensed dispensing optician in states that require a license with 2+ years of experience, or ABO-certified optician in non-licensing states. ABO certification or licensed optician preferred.
